trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud must see to one last thing before he departs.

TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_01<tab>Ever one to take the feelings of others into consideration, Alphinaud states that he will inform Tataru of your plans, and bids you go on ahead to the airship landing. Let Cid know that he will be along shortly.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_02<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> has been prepared for departure, and Alphinaud has rejoined you. Inform Wedge that you are ready to board.

TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_03<tab>Aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, you take a moment to yourself and gaze into the Sea of Clouds. In the silence, familiar words echo in your mind. “For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.” You close your eyes and attempt to turn your thoughts elsewhere─only to be confronted with the memory of a broken shield...
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_04<tab>Arriving in the Blue Window, you find no Vanu waiting to receive you. Nevertheless, Alphinaud appears to be on edge.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_SEQ_05<tab>Alphinaud advises you to be vigilant, for their scouts could be lurking anywhere─even watching you as you speak...
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cid at the airship landing.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wedge.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wedge.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Into<var 1A 01 /var> the fire, is it... In that case, I should inform Tataru of our plans.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>Pray go on ahead to the airship landing. I shall join you anon.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_CID_000_010<tab>The boys have been hard at work preparing for our flight, and I'm pleased to say we are ready to depart.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_CID_000_011<tab>That is, as soon as a certain... Ah.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>Pray forgive me my lateness. Tataru and I had much to discuss.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>We still have no news of the missing Scions, but she assures me that Urianger and Riol are pursuing promising leads.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_CID_000_014<tab>Come, come─we can continue this discussion aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>!

TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_WEDGE_000_015<tab>Good to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It'll be a pleasure to have you aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> again!
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_BIGGS_000_016<tab>I, uh, heard about your man Haurchefant... Sorry for your loss, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_WEDGE_000_020<tab>The others are waiting for you aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Shall we get going?
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_Q1_000_000<tab>Board the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_A1_000_002<tab>No

TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_LKHONEBB_000_020<tab>Hello there, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! So you know, I'll be available to ferry you back and forth once the chief charts a course. Deputy president's orders and all that.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_IRONWORKER01643_000_020<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you require transport to the Blue Window?
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>From here, Camp Cloudtop looks rather far...
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>Ahem. Be on your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Vanu could be anywhere─even watching us as we speak...

TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_CID_000_040<tab>We'll keep the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> here for now, but if you need to head back to Ishgard, you can use that standard to signal for an Ironworks airship.
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_CID_000_041<tab>Don't worry─we charted a route safe enough for others to fly...unless that primal shows up. But what are the odds of that, eh?
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_WEDGE_000_042<tab>We'll stay in touch with your Temple Knight friend, don't you worry!
TEXT_HEAVNA502_01643_BIGGS_000_043<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> is ready to fly at a moment's notice. Just come running if you run afoul of something you can't handle.
